name: 危城逃生
description:
Everything in the world has changed overnight, and you will face difficulties, thrills, and death with the protagonist. Search for keys, solve puzzles, engage in battles, and use all your means to escape from residential buildings, taking your first step out of the city!
Game content: Carefully collect resources, manage resources properly, solve various puzzles, and then use bullets to leave bullet holes on the zombie's head!
Game features: Various resources are limited, and it is not recommended to engage in unnecessary battles with zombies. The progression of the game is diverse, and you can choose different routes to achieve the ultimate goal. Some residents' stories can be seen in the scattered narrative of items.
